Please find included below (4) useful libraries for NEAT C++ code 
developm=
ent:


"CString-clone Using Standard C++", O'Leary, Joe.
A Drop-In replacem=
ent for CString that builds on the Standard C++ 
Library's basic_string tem=
plate.

k.net/~jmoleary/stdstring.htm


"CppSQLite - C++ Wrapper for SQLite", Grove=
s, Rob.

ww.codeproject.com/database/CppSQLite.asp

"Tree Co=
ntainer Library", Haas, Mitchel.
A generic template class library for stori=
ng data in a tree-like 
structure.

iew.php

t,

ANN is a library written in C++, which supports=
 data structures and
